scripts.start: export DEV=true && node -r esm index.js --name signup --duration 30
scripts.publish: npm run build && docker push tideorg/orkstress:vnext
scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && docker build -t tideorg/orkstress:vnext .
scripts.build:prepare: del tmp && copyfiles -u 1 node_modules/tide-js/*.json node_modules/tide-js/src/**/**/**/** tmp
